body: This might be helpful. Code that's started using GIT_TERMINAL_PROMPT had other workarounds before, e.g. vim-plug took `https://github.com/junegunn/seoul256.vim.git` and inserted `git::@` to give `https://git::@github.com/junegunn/seoul256.vim.git`. See https://github.com/junegunn/vim-plug/wiki/faq#whats-the-deal-with-git-in-the-url
